subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia of the Boston Red Sox won a World Series and the A.L. Rookie of the Year award in 2007. He added the award for A.L.’s most valuable player to his résumé on Tuesday.
snippet: Dustin Pedroia of the Boston Red Sox won a World Series and the A.L. Rookie of the Year award in 2007. He added the award for A.L.’s most valuable player to his résumé on Tuesday.
